name: Enterprise Car Sales
tag_list: used-cars, used-car, used-trucks, car-sales, cars, autos, vehicles, automotive
overview:
Enterprise Car sales offers a large selection of used cars for sale with vehicle certification and haggle-free buying. We only sell certified used vehicles. Every Enterprise used vehicle has passed a rigorous 109-point inspection performed by an ASE-Certified technician.

For more than 40 years, we’ve been selling cars only one way. We select great cars - most from our fleet of more than 1 million vehicles - offer them at competitive used car prices, and back each one with one of the industry’s best used car warranties.

All of our cars come with a free Carfax report for added piece of mind. Cars come with a 7-day repurchase agreement which means we’ll buy it back if you aren’t fully satisfied.
